/*
Language: Backus–Naur Form
Website: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Backus–Naur_form
Author: Oleg Efimov <efimovov@gmail.com>
*/ /** @type LanguageFn */function bnf(hljs){return{name:'Backus–Naur Form',contains:[// Attribute
{className:'attribute',begin:/</,end:/>/},// Specific
{begin:/::=/,end:/$/,contains:[{begin:/</,end:/>/},// Common
hljs.C_LINE_COMMENT_MODE,hljs.C_BLOCK_COMMENT_MODE,hljs.APOS_STRING_MODE,hljs.QUOTE_STRING_MODE]}]};}module.exports=bnf;
